title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-2.13 - Floors
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-2.13 - Floors

State Regulations

Floors in food preparation areas are to be constructed of concrete, asphalt, tight wood or other similar cleanable material kept in good repair. Dirt or gravel, when graded to drain, may be used as subflooring, when covered with clean removable platforms or duckboards, or covered with wood chips, shavings, or other suitable materials effectively treated to control dust. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10

14-2.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
